algorithm_technique: Frequency counting using an array, then iterating to find max vowel and consonant frequencies.
problem_summary_simple: Find the most frequent vowel and consonant in a string and return the sum of their frequencies.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a frequency array for all letters and a set for vowels to find max frequencies of each type.
key_insights: A fixed-size array (26 for lowercase English letters) is efficient for frequency counting.
A set provides O(1) average time complexity for checking if a character is a vowel.
The problem statement allows choosing any character if multiple have the same max frequency.
